Big Bass Bonanza Megaways Demo Free Spins
You can activate free spins at the moment when 3 or more Scatters appear on the playing field. As a result, you can take from 10 to 20 free spins. The more scatters, the more free spins you get.

When you spin the slot with free spins, the Fisherman may appear on the screen, which collects cash values ​​and gives out multipliers. For every 4 Fisherman symbols, you get a restart of free spins, as well as multipliers from x2 to x10. This bonus feature is present in all versions of the game.
Big Bass Bonanza Golden Fish: Dynamite

In some versions of the game, a special Dynamite feature is available. This is a random bonus that is triggered in the free spins mode in the bonus round. When this symbol appears and in the absence of cash fish, dynamite is thrown onto the field. It can turn regular symbols into cash. Thanks to this feature, the chances of winning become much higher, even if you do not have cash symbols on the screen.
Dynamite is one of the main elements of surprise in the game. Therefore, it can make the gameplay even more exciting and unpredictable. And the most important thing is increased winnings.

In the free spins round, the Bazooka function is always activated randomly. When a fisherman appears on the screen where there are no suitable fish symbols, he can activate the bazooka. It completely replaces all current symbols with new ones.

This function gives an excellent opportunity for money symbols to appear to increase your winnings. Basically, the Bazooka function is relevant for the Megaways version and some other slots in the fishing series.

In some versions, another interesting bonus function is available - the Hook. After the spins, an animation with a fisherman may appear on the screen, who begins to pull symbols out of the lake with his hook. As a result, you can get the desired symbols on the screen even after the spin has stopped. This option adds surprise to the game and allows you to compensate for previous unsuccessful spins.

If you manage to collect 4 Fisherman symbols in the bonus round, this will activate repeated free spins. As a result, the player is awarded 10 more free spins, and all current winnings are increased by special multipliers. This function makes long series with free spins possible. It is especially relevant to use it in a slot with high volatility.

Almost all versions of the game from Pragmatic Play have this bonus buy function. This is a special opportunity to get instant access to bonus rounds for a fixed amount. As a result, you do not need to wait for Scatters to appear. Convenient for those who like fast gaming sessions and want to take maximum winnings. The function is relevant for high rollers.
